author: potuz
content: Hey <@486501030046203915> <@725415098331430932> are you organizing a panel on ILs for Devcon? I was going to apply for something in the cypherpunk track (rather than the core track where I was planning on something else) and then realized that you guys may already be thinking on something else.

author: barnabemonnot
content: I don't have any plan yet, think there is room for more than one type of content on ILs anyway, e.g., a talk could be good on top of a panel. In any case you should certainly go ahead!
